properties.title: Looking up Components with a ContainerFixture

section.name: Using a ContainerFixture to Look Up Components
section.p: The abstract class org.fest.swing.fixture.ContainerFixture provides shortcuts to look up GUI components inside the Container being tested. There are three overloaded versions of each shortcut method, each for each component lookup type (by name, type or GenericTypeMatcher.)

subsection.name: Looking up 'showing' GUI components only
subsection.p: By default, component lookup returns the GUI component that matches the given search criteria, regardless if the component is showing or not (by 'showing' we mean that the component's method 'isShowing()' returns true.) To limit component lookup to showing components only, we need to call the method 'lookUpShowingComponentsOnly(boolean)' in ContainerFixture.
This setting affects component lookup by name and type only. Creators of GenericTypeMatchers need to specify if lookup includes non-showing components or not.
